TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PolygonHotSpot extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot
Public NotInheritable Class PolygonHotSpot Inherits HotSpot
public ref class PolygonHotSpot sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpot

summary.span: 在 控件中定义多边形作用点区域。

span.span: Defines a polygon-shaped hot spot region in an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类定义中的多边形作用点区域控件。This class defines a polygon-shaped hot spot region in an control. 可用于定义不规则形状中的作用点区域控件。The is useful for defining irregularly shaped hot spot regions in an control. 例如，您可以使用它来定义地图中的各个区域。For example, you can use it to define individual regions within a geographical map. 若要定义的区域，将属性设置为一个字符串，指定的每个顶点的坐标对象。To define the region of a , set the property to a string that specifies the coordinates of each vertex of the object. 多边形顶点是两个多边形边缘满足的一个点。A polygon vertex is a point at which two polygon edges meet. 当单击对象、 页面导航到的 URL、 生成回发到服务器，或不执行任何操作。When a object is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing. 属性指定此行为。The property specifies this behavior. 若要导航到的 URL，将设置属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Navigate`，并使用属性来指定要导航到的 URL。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, and use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要发布回服务器，设置属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`，并使用属性指定的名称对象。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, and use the property to specify a name for the object. 此名称将传入事件数据时单击。This name will be passed in the event data when the is clicked. 如果你想对象不具有任何行为，设置属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。If you want the object to have no behavior, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件，其中包含三个对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains three objects. 每个对象表示在地图上的地理区域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 当用户单击对象，回发到服务器并在标签中显示的类型和名称的作用点。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server and the type and name of the hot spot are displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.Class1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Class1/CS/polygonhotspot.class1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.Class1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Class1/VB/polygonhotspot.class1vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建对象，并将其添加到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a object and add it to an control. 控件包含其他两个以声明方式添加的对象。The control contains two other objects that have been added declaratively. 每个对象表示在地图上的地理区域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 当用户单击对象，回发到服务器并在标签中显示的类型和名称的作用点。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server and the type and name of the hot spot are displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/CS/polygonhotspot.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/VB/polygonhotspot.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Coordinates { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Coordinates : string with get, set

summary.span: 表示 对象顶点的坐标的字符串。

span.span: A string of coordinates that represents the vertexes of a object.

value.span: 表示 对象的顶点坐标的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the coordinates of a object's vertexes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的顶点坐标对象。Use the property to specify the coordinates of the vertexes of a object. 多边形顶点是两个多边形边缘满足的一个点。A polygon vertex is a point at which two polygon edges meet. 您指定的字符串必须格式化为逗号分隔每个坐标。The string that you specify must be formatted with each coordinate separated by a comma. X 坐标和 y 坐标，必须具有你指定每个顶点。Each vertex that you specify must have both an x- coordinate and a y-coordinate. 例如，字符串"128185335157510224510383228383"定义具有五个顶点多边形作用点。For example, the string "128,185,335,157,510,224,510,383,228,383" defines a polygon hot spot with five vertexes. 第一个顶点的 x 坐标是 128。The x-coordinate of the first vertex is 128. 第一个顶点的 y 坐标是 185。The y-coordinate of the first vertex is 185. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建对象，并将其添加到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a object and add it to an control. 属性用于指定的顶点坐标对象。The property is used to specify the coordinates of the vertexes of the object. 控件包含其他两个以声明方式添加的对象。The control contains two other objects that have been added declaratively. 每个对象表示在地图上的地理区域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 当用户单击对象，回发到服务器并在标签中显示的类型和名称的作用点。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server and the type and name of the hot spot are displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/CS/polygonhotspot.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.Cstr/VB/polygonhotspot.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 返回表示 对象的顶点坐标的字符串。

span.span: Returns a string that represents the coordinates of the vertexes of a object.

returns.span: 表示 对象的顶点坐标的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the coordinates of the vertexes of a object.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个字符串，表示的顶点坐标对象。The method returns a string that represents the coordinates of the vertexes of a object. 此方法返回的字符串的当前值是否是属性。The string this method returns is the current value of the property. 方法用于在内部由 ASP.NET 获取要使用的坐标的文本呈现时。The method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a when it is rendered. 返回的字符串是特定于浏览器和标记语言。The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建控件，其中包含三个对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that contains three objects. 每个对象表示在地图上的地理区域。Each object represents a geographical region on the map. 当用户单击对象时，回发到服务器。When the user clicks a object, it posts back to the server. 方法，以便它们可以显示在标签中检索的多边形的顶点坐标。The method retrieves the coordinates of the polygon's vertexes so that they can be displayed in a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates/CS/polygonhotspot.getcoordinatescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PolygonHotSpot.GetCoordinates/VB/polygonhotspot.getcoordinatesvb.aspx#1)]
